title: Black Table
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles Denby
provenance_text:
Richard Diebenkorn [1922-1993], Berkeley, CA. Mr. [1901-1982] and Mrs. Charles Denby (Rosamond Reed Denby) [1906-1988], Sewickley, PA, by January 1963 until December 17, 1970 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1970.

Notes:
[1]. Mr. and Mrs. Charles Denby lent the painting to the exhibition "Art Since 1900 - Privately Owned in the Pittsburgh Area held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January - February 1963.
